name: Cotton Spore
summary: Lowers the target's Speed stat by two stages. Pok√©mon that are either holding Safety Goggles or have the ability Overcoat are immune to this move.
viability: The ability to lower your opponent's Speed stat by two whole stages (or half the current speed) is a great choIce. This can slow down traditional sweepers and can cause an easy revenge kill. Prankster Whimsicott, espeically, utilizes this move well.
